page.title: 05Daily Life
page.content: In the morning I get up and go and muck the ponies out.Then at 7.30 I come back to have my breakfast.I have Weetabix with milk and sugar.Then I go into the lounge to eat it and Mum comes down and puts the television on and she goes and makes a drink of coke for me.Then I go up stairs to get washed with soap and water and then I brush my teeth and at 8.45 I go out to School and we have assembly where we have a story and sing some songs and say a prayer and then we do some work Mathes or English.Then at 10.40 we go out to play Kiss,Cuddle or Torcher. Then the bell rings at 11.00 and we go in and the Teacher talks to us.Then we go out to play rounders.Then we come in and get ready for dinner.We go into the cloakroom to wash our hands then we go into the canteen and have our dinner.Then we go out to play.
